mapper.sql: UUID, CREATETIME, CHECKTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, TYPE, CREATER, CHECKER, STARTER, ENDER, SUPPLIERUUID, TOTALMONEY, STATE, WAYBILLSN
mapper.select:
select a.uuid,a.createtime,a.starttime,a.starter,a.ender,b.name,a.totalmoney,a.state FROM orders a,emp b where 1=1
and b.name like concat(concat('%',#{emp.name}),'%')
order by a.createtime desc
mapper.insert: insert into orders (UUID, CREATETIME, CHECKTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, TYPE, CREATER, CHECKER, STARTER, ENDER, SUPPLIERUUID, TOTALMONEY, STATE, WAYBILLSN) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplieruuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalmoney,jdbcType=REAL}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waybillsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into orders
UUID,
CREATETIME,
CHECKTIME,
STARTTIME,
ENDTIME,
TYPE,
CREATER,
CHECKER,
STARTER,
ENDER,
SUPPLIERUUID,
TOTALMONEY,

WAYBILLSN,

mapper.update:
update orders
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STARTTIME = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STARTER = #{starter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENDER = #{ender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIERUUID = #{supplieruuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTALMONEY = #{totalmoney,jdbcType=REAL},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAYBILLSN = #{waybillsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update orders set CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STARTTIME = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STARTER = #{starter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENDER = #{ender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIERUUID = #{supplieruuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTALMONEY = #{totalmoney,jdbcType=REAL}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAYBILLSN = #{waybillsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
